Golden age [i](If you cast an instant or sorcery spell, activated a nonmana ability, and attacked this turn, enter a renaissance for this game.)[/i]
{2}{R}{G}{W}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. It gains haste and vigilance until end of turn. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step unless you’re in a renaissance.
